title: Display Vintage Retro Font
content:
What font is this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-14%20at%207_4576.25.09%20PM.png)

Font: 

 Similar to Tropicana 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-10-14 at 7.25.09 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-14%20at%207.25.09%20PM.png) | 110.21 KB |
author: splrful

comments.content:
These letters are in the Trefoil -- three lobe -- variant of a style called Tuscan. Here are some in the style: Frontiersman [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/frontiersman/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/frontiersman/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/frontiersman/") Hustlers [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/decade-typefoundry/Hustlers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/decade-typefoundry/Hustlers/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/decade-typefoundry/Hustlers/") Cactus Flower [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/cactus-flower-sg/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/cactus-flower-sg/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/cactus-flower-sg/") Massell [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/massel/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/massel/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/massel/")  
Surrey [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/surrey/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/surrey/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/surrey/")  
Don

Also JF Fair [http://www.dafont.com/jf-fair-faces.font?text=HOME](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.dafont.com/jf-fair-faces.font?text=HOME "http://www.dafont.com/jf-fair-faces.font?text=HOME")  
BTW your design dates from the decades around 1830.  
Don

Thanks!

I got the font from this video, in case you were wondering.  
 [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYlCciotcEQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYlCciotcEQ "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYlCciotcEQ")

Seeing now the video, it could possibly be hand-done (or a hand-set/alphabet). All repeating letters are different. Some more alternatives but unfortunately none being hand-done: [Grotesque Salloon](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/grotesque-salloon), [Tropicana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.dafont.com/tropicana.font), [Chipperfield and Bailey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.dafont.com/chipperfield-and-ba.font), [Trocadero](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.dafont.com/trocadero.font), [Fontanolio Beveled](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.dafont.com/fontaniolo-beveled.font), [imprenta Royal Nonpareil](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344/http:/www.dafont.com/imprenta-royal-nonpareil.font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131344im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_4899.png)
Those fonts are great, especially tropicana! They really resemble this hand-written one. Thanks
